mcq.statement: Which of the following personalities contributed to the intellectual atmosphere of the Muhammadan Educational Conference?
mcq.one_liner: Prominent figures such as **Maulana Shibli Naumani, Maulana Hali, Maulana Nazeer Ahmad, and Nawab Muhsin-ul-Mulk** enriched the intellectual environment of the Muhammadan Educational Conference.
